lexUnit.name: cross-examination.n
lexUnit.definition: FN: an event in court procedure in which a witness is questioned to further examine statements that they made when they were questioned by the other party.

sentence.text: Under cross-examination he denied his evidence was tainted by any bitterness he held for British soldiers because he had been jailed in 1968 for five years in Manchester for assault .
